summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2018 FOREST RIVER WILDWOOD RV EQUIPPED WITH LIONHEAD TIRES, TIRE LINE: CASTLE ROCK, TIRE SIZE: 235/80/R17, DOT NUMBER: JUMR. THE CONTACT STATED WHILE DRIVING 50 MPH, THE PASSENGER'S SIDE REAR TIRE EXPERIENCED A BLOWOUT. THE CONTACT PULLED THE VEHICLE TO THE SIDE OF THE ROADWAY AND REPLACED THE TIRE WITH THE SPARE TIRE. THE TIRE WAS ORIGINAL EQUIPMENT. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 2,800.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2018 FOREST RIVER WILDWOOD. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE RV'S FRONT END STARTED TO SLIP WHILE DRIVING DOWN THE ROAD. THE CONTACT ALSO STATED THAT THE CAMPER WAS CRACKING FROM THE OUTSIDE INTO THE INSIDE OF THE BEDROOM AND SEPARATING. ADDITIONALLY, THE WELDS FRACTURED AROUND THE PROPANE TANK. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO A DEALER FOR REPAIRS. THE CONTACT FORWARDED AN EMAIL TO THE MANUFACTURER. THE CAMPER USUALLY STORED JEFF BRIGHT RV SERVICES & SALES (2109 INDUSTRIAL PARK RD, ROCK FALLS, IL 61071). THE CONTACT WAS ADVISED TO TAKE THE VEHICLE TO A DEALER FOR THE REPAIR. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE RV WAS UNDER AN EXTENDED WARRANTY. THE RV WAS NOT REPAIRED.*DT*DT*DT*DT*DT  CONSUMER STATED CRACKS ARE WORSENING.*JB  THE CONSUMER STATED FOREST RIVER OFFERED 2021 HERTIAGE GLEN 370BL LTZ CUSTOM BUILT AND THE CONSUMER ACCEPTED THE OFFER. *TR  *JB*JB*JB
THE FRAME IS CRACKING, TEARING WHERE REAR EXCELS ATTACH .I NOTICED THIS CONDITION ON A WALK THRU BEFORE GOING ON A TRIP.

SO THIS IS SOME OF THE STUFF THAT NEEDED TO BE COMPLETED:  REPLACE 7 WAY LEFT TURN SIGNAL  REPLACE BRAKES (THERE WAS A SHORT AND THEY LOCKED UP AND STARTED SMOKING)  TAIL LIGHT LENSE WAS NOT SECURE AND FELL OFF AS WE DROVE DOWN THE ROAD, ANOTHER CAR TOLD US IT CAME OFF  HOT AND COLD FAUCETS WERE REVERSED IN THE SHOWER  BROKEN TRIM   OUTSIDE SPEAKER NOT WORKING  PLUG FOR LIGHTS WAS FAULTY
